properties.text: Checkmate the AI within a maximum of 50 moves.

- Drag and Drop pieces using touch controls or mouse

- When the promotion screen appears, tap the desired piece

- If you feel like restarting the game, tap the circular arrow button

- If your pawn reaches the top row, it gets promoted

- To checkmate, ensure the Black King is attacked and cannot move

- If the Black King cannot move but is not under attack, it is a draw by stalemate

- Only a King combined with a Rook or Queen can checkmate
